Plot: The story of the assassination of U.S. Senator Robert F. Kennedy who was shot in the early morning hours of June 5, 1968 in the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles, and 22 people in the hotel whose lives were never the same.
Title: Bobby
Actors: Harry Belafonte, Joy Bryant, Nick Cannon, Emilio Estevez
tomatoConsensus: Despite best intentions from director Emilio Estevez and his ensemble cast, they succumb to a script filled with pointless subplots and awkward moments working too hard to parallel contemporary times.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 15 nominations.
